def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_light_grey = is_light(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_x_alone = all([not all_close([x,dot], ctx) for dot in idxs if dot != x])
        if (
            check_x_large
            and check_x_light_grey
            and check_x_alone
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_right = is_right(x, None, ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_light_grey = is_light(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        if (
            check_x_right
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_light_grey
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results
state = turn(state)
